item.title: Welcome
item.description: This isn’t my first blog, but this is the first blog I plan to keep for a while. I’ve always found that blogging is a good habit, it helps structure what you learn keeps you less distracted and also helps share knowledge with others. I plan to write about things I am currently learning about right now (databases). Things I find useful at work (reliability) and even hobby projects (compilers).
